text:
Stocks are chosen
by Wall Street
Journal editors
Contains some
illiquid stocks,
price weighting
and adjusted for
high-priced shares
Has a large
number of small
illiquid stocks
making it hard to
replicate. Contains
93% of the market
cap of Japanese
equities
Available in both
U.S. dollars and
local currency
Is the model
portfolio for an
ETF
Formerly compiled
by Lehman
Brothers
Represents liquid
portion of market
and rebalanced
monthly
Represents
publicly traded
REITS
